title: Cloud Security Policy Creation
description: As the company moves to the cloud, a GRC analyst must create a new Cloud Security Policy from scratch.

tasks.description: Research industry best practices and frameworks for cloud security (e.g., CSA Cloud Controls Matrix).
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst gathers relevant best practice information.

tasks.description: Draft a new policy that covers key cloud security topics like identity management, data protection, and infrastructure configuration.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst drafts a comprehensive and well-structured policy.

tasks.description: Circulate the draft policy to key stakeholders (e.g., cloud engineering, legal) for review and feedback before seeking final approval.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst effectively manages the stakeholder review process.
